ethtolatam.title: Bringing ETH
ethtolatamBogota.paragraph1: ETH Latam Bogota will be a one-day event all in Spanish with talks and workshops for people who want to learn about Ethereum. It is the gateway for everyone who wants to learn about the principles, values, uses and impact of the technology.
ethtolatamBogota.paragraph2: A space co-created between all the communities in Latin America to communicate the impact of Ethereum on the quality of life of people and the change of mindset.
ethtolatamBuenosAires.paragraph1: The ETH Latam conference has become possible thanks to the foundations laid by local pioneers in Argentina, who managed to build a vibrant community that has made crypto, Ethereum in particular, mainstream in one of the countries that needs it most.
ethtolatamBuenosAires.paragraph2: In Latin America, the possibilities offered by Ethereum are not just an option, but the alternative for people to build a new system where no one is left behind. In this way, ETH Latam brings together the global community of creators and educators with the most vibrant crypto communities in the world, who use Ethereum protocols and technology in their daily lives, providing real solutions to real problems.

theOtherSide.title: The other side
faqs.title: Faq
faqs.1.title: What are the COVID policies?
faqs.1.content:
We are closely monitoring the ongoing situation, and while currently there are some restrictions in place in Argentina, we are optimistic that local regulations in Buenos Aires will allow us to host the week. We will provide updates as we get closer.

Here you will find the requirements for entry to Argentina.
faqs.2.title: How to be a speaker?
faqs.2.content: ETH Latam speakers cover many different subjects and address different levels of comprehension of the blockchain technology, through conferences and workshops. We welcome speakers from everywhere to come and share their knowledge. Apply to speak on this form.
faqs.3.title: I'm new to Ethereum, can I participate?
faqs.3.content: Absolutely! Our agenda contemplates talks for both beginners and experienced people of the web3 world. The focus in general are those who are involved/interested in the Ethereum ecosystem and want to dive deeper!
faqs.4.title: What to do in Buenos Aires?
faqs.4.content: We want you to experience Buenos Aires, here you can find some relevant info about the city.
faqs.5.title: Where to stay?
faqs.5.content: There are plenty of hotels near the venue. Here you can find a list of recommended hotels.
faqs.6.title: How can I host a side event?
faqs.6.content:
Our goal with ETH Latam is to encourage decentralized coordination of an Ethereum-based event series. There will naturally be a lot more events, parties, and activities taking place the week of ETH Latam.

If you want to host your own side event, we’re happy to help! Just fill out this form
faqs.7.title: Have questions or ideas?
faqs.7.content: Do you have any questions or ideas that you want to suggest? Email us at hello@ethlatam.org
